description: This beautifully updated townhome features 3 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, 1800+ sqft and a spacious side by side double garage with 2 car driveway! Tons of recent updates include flooring, paint, blinds, kitchen, bathrooms, EV charging, and more! The main level offers a well-appointed kitchen, laundry, and a convenient 2-piece bathroom. A skylight brightens the staircase leading upstairs, with a generous primary bedroom complete with a soaker tub and separate stand-up shower, plus 2 additional bedrooms and full bathroom. Enjoy a fully fenced backyard with patio, ideal for outdoor entertaining and pets. Excellent school catchment and close to recreation, shopping, and transit, this home is located in a quiet, friendly community.
